text: The school looks welcoming to children with colourful and vibrant lightings. My child felt comfortable even on the first visit while the manager, Linus was briefing us on the school curriculum. Linus was also very helpful and attentive to our needs and concerns. Overall, it’s a great experience and we’re looking forward to first day of school.

We went for a tour @ Playfacto Waterway and I must say the staff is very attentive in our query and when we are explaining on our concerns we felt on other student care. The instructions and explanations he gave was very clear and we can see he is very calm. We are very pleased to have our child under his care.

Love this student care very much.
Homework and revision will be settled and hassle free for full time mummy like me.
Environment is awesome and all the teachers are patient. Guide and take good care of students all the time. Well done WWP Playfacto!

I have been extremely impressed with the student care services provided by PlayFacto WWP. From the very beginning, the staff was welcoming, attentive, and genuinely committed to supporting my child's growth.
Highly recommended for anyone looking for a supportive and professional student care service!
Good experience! Very prompt response. Got to tour the space before confirming. Very nice space for the kids and teachers very attentive too. My girl can't wait to start!
